introduce.heading1: Passionate about programming, but it seems programming doesn't love me back. Nevertheless, I keep learning a little bit at a time.
introduce.heading2: Frontend development is not just a job, it's an art! I turn ideas into visual and dynamic experiences.
introduce.header3.1: Beautiful interfaces don't happen by themselves — they require a bit of
introduce.header3.4: I love creating products that make users feel at ease from the very first glance.
introduce.heading4.2: is my world, where I transform code into emotions! I never stop learning and creating to deliver the smoothest web experience.

exp.exp-title: Although I have not had the opportunity to participate in real-world jobs or internships, I have always been proactive in learning and developing my professional skills through online learning platforms. Below are some courses I have completed, which have helped me build a strong foundation in the field of

projectPage.title: My recent products
projectPage.subtitle: Here are some self-taught projects that I have developed, each one representing a step forward in my journey of skill development.

about.target: I aim to become a full-stack developer in the field of web development, starting with Front-end and expanding into Back-end, performance optimization, web security, and system deployment. I am always eager to learn and stay updated with new technologies to create high-quality web products with technical depth and long-lasting practical value for businesses.
about.paragraph2: from the sunny and windy land of Vinh Linh, Quang Tri.
about.paragraph3: I am currently a senior student at FPT Polytechnic College (FPOLY), Danang, majoring in
about.paragraph4: Although I have encountered many difficulties and failures on my learning journey, I still maintain my passion for programming and am determined to pursue this path. I always strive to learn and practice to develop my skills comprehensively.
about.paragraph5: Besides studying, I also like playing sports and mobile games to train my thinking.
about.paragraph6: In my free time, I have a habit of learning about technology through videos and specialized articles. Maybe that's why I don't often participate in extracurricular activities or hang out with friends.
